Class InvoiceController

java.lang.Object
control.billing.InvoiceController
public class InvoiceController extends Object
Controller for managing invoices. Handles creation, calculation, retrieval, and modification of invoices.

      public InvoiceController()

  • Method Details

    • createInvoice

      public static void createInvoice(String customerId, String apptId, double taxRate) throws InvalidInputException, EntityNotFoundException
      Creates a new invoice based on the specified prescription.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer.
      apptId - The ID of the appointment associated with the invoice.
      taxRate - The tax rate to apply to the invoice.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If any input is invalid (e.g., negative tax rate or empty customer ID).
      EntityNotFoundException - If the prescription or appointment is not found.

    • recalculateInvoiceCost

      public static void recalculateInvoiceCost(String apptId) throws InvalidInputException, EntityNotFoundException
      Recalculates the cost of an existing invoice based on prescription items.
      Parameters:
      apptId - The ID of the appointment for which the invoice cost needs to be recalculated.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the appointment ID is invalid.
      EntityNotFoundException - If the invoice or prescription is not found.

    • incBalance

      public static void incBalance(Invoice inv, double cost) throws InvalidInputException
      Increases the balance of a given invoice by a specified cost.
      Parameters:
      inv - The invoice to update.
      cost - The cost to add to the invoice's balance.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the cost is negative.

    • payBalance

      public static void payBalance(Invoice inv, double payment) throws InvalidInputException
      Makes a payment towards the balance of a given invoice.
      Parameters:
      inv - The invoice to make a payment against.
      payment - The payment amount.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the payment is less than or equal to zero, or exceeds the current balance.

    • getInvoiceById

      public static Invoice getInvoiceById(String invoiceId) throws InvalidInputException, EntityNotFoundException
      Retrieves an invoice by its ID.
      Parameters:
      invoiceId - The ID of the invoice.
      Returns:
      The Invoice object.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the invoice ID is invalid.
      EntityNotFoundException - If the invoice is not found.

    • getInvoiceByCustomer

      public static List<Invoice> getInvoiceByCustomer(String customerId)
      Retrieves a list of invoices for a specified customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer.
      Returns:
      A list of invoices for the customer, sorted by invoice ID.

    • getAllInvoices

      public static List<Invoice> getAllInvoices()
      Retrieves a list of all invoices.
      Returns:
      A list of all invoices, sorted by invoice ID.

    • cancelInvoice

      public static Boolean cancelInvoice(String invoiceId) throws InvalidInputException, EntityNotFoundException
      Cancels the specified invoice.
      Parameters:
      invoiceId - The ID of the invoice to cancel.
      Returns:
      True if the operation is successful.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the invoice ID is invalid.
      EntityNotFoundException - If the invoice is not found.

    • deleteInvoice

      public static void deleteInvoice(String invoiceId) throws InvalidInputException, EntityNotFoundException
      Deletes the specified invoice.
      Parameters:
      invoiceId - The ID of the invoice to delete.
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If the invoice ID is invalid.
      EntityNotFoundException - If the invoice is not found.

    • getInvoiceByAppt

      public static Invoice getInvoiceByAppt(String apptId)
      Retrieves an invoice by its associated appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      apptId - The ID of the appointment.
      Returns:
      The corresponding invoice.
